name: Big Toe Pose
description: Padangusthasana (Big Toe Pose) is a beginner standing forward bend.  Grasp your big toe, lengthening your spine before folding forward.  Benefits include hamstring stretch, improved balance, and calming the mind. Maintain a straight back and engage your core.

name: Gorilla Pose
description: Gorilla Pose (Padahastasana) is a beginner standing forward bend.  Benefits include stretching hamstrings and spine.  Keep knees slightly bent, lengthen spine before folding, and reach for the floor with relaxed hands.

name: Bird of Paradise Pose
description: A challenging standing balance (Svarga Dvijasana), Bird of Paradise Pose strengthens legs and core, improves balance and flexibility.  Maintain a straight spine, engage core, and keep hips square for optimal alignment.
